an2.118-129:4.4: Imā kho, bhikkhave, dve āsā duppajahā”ti.
an2.118-129:6.3: Yo ca pubbakārī, yo ca kataññū katavedī.
an2.118-129:6.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā dullabhā lokasmin”ti.
an2.118-129:8.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā dullabhā lokasmin”ti.
an2.118-129:10.3: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vissajjeti.
an2.118-129:10.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā duttappayā”ti.
an2.118-129:12.3: Yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ na nikkhipati, yo ca laddhaṃ laddhaṃ na vissajjeti.
an2.118-129:12.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve puggalā sutappayā”ti.
an2.118-129:14.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā rāgassa uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:16.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā dosassa uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:18.3: Parato ca ghoso ayoniso ca manasikāro.
an2.118-129:18.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā micchādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:20.3: Parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro.
an2.118-129:20.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyā”ti.
an2.118-129:22.3: Lahukā ca āpatti, garukā ca āpatti.
an2.118-129:24.3: Duṭṭhullā ca āpatti, aduṭṭhullā ca āpatti.
an2.118-129:26.3: Sāvasesā ca āpatti, anavasesā ca āpatti.
